text: Jeremy Francis John Bowen (born 6 February 1960) is a Welsh journalist and television presenter. He was born in Cardiff, Wales. He is the BBC's Middle East correspondent working in Jerusalem between 1995 and 2000.The Guardian, 17 June 2005, Bowen named BBC Middle East editor He has been its Middle East Editor since 2005. Bowen was diagnosed with bowel cancer in April 2019. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Photograph. BBC. * Newswatch: Jeremy Bowen. BBC. * Bowen Middle East role 'enhanced'. BBC.
